short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash the majestic power of a soaring dragon with this captivating theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: As the dragon flies over a rugged, snow-covered mountain range during a breathtaking sunset, this extension immerses you in a fantasy world where the fiery glow of the dragon's wings contrasts with the cool, shadowed peaks. With vibrant orange and red hues against a serene mountainous backdrop, this theme offers an epic blend of adventure and mystery, making every new tab feel like a step into a mythic journey. Perfect for fantasy lovers, this theme brings the untamed beauty of dragons to life on your browser.
